name: Atomic Bond
description:
A cool game about merging atoms through atomic fusion. Try to get the highest score, and don't run into the big guys! 

The web gl build for some reason thinks everyone is the same person for the leaderboard. The windows version does actually give a unique id to each player.

The game also starts to lag when you get to a certain size, this is due to us using physics rigid bodies with not a ton of optimization. As such as your atom gets larger, more and more load is being placed on the cpu, causing the lag in question.

Controls: 

  • Your mouse is key, left click and hold guides your atom, right click zooms out. 
  • Read the tutorial for better information .

Tools Used: 

  • Our own Sweat and Blood: Chavezfk, Mewbusi, bamboozledshibe . 
  • https://github.com/SorkinType/Atomic-Age
